Soqotri people are not Somali at all! They speak their own language, Soqotri, which isn't Arabic either but is a Semitic language and related to other Modern South Arabian languages like Mehri and Shehri, whose speakers are located in Yemen and Oman. It was once part of the Himyarite Kingdom that was ancient Yemen. Foreign powers, including Ethiopians, Portuguese, Indian, Omani, British and these days Emiratis have all stopped for a time, but in its long history back to ancient times, the inhabitants were never Somali tribes nor was it ever part of or under control of Somaliland, Puntland, Somalia, or any Somali clan.

Beause it is in a crossroads, the Soqotri people have Afro and Indo races mixed in, but the predominant genetic heritage is Arabian. Some individuals show more of the others but in the same family you have a variety. You can see similar mixes all along the coast of Yemen and Oman. Very old pictures clearly show the Arab characteristics and style of dress of the people, and Hamid himself in the video is clearly Arab with some African admixture.

I have met several officials and students from Soqotra and have lived on both sides of the water including the Horn of Africa. Soqotri people in no way, shape or form consider themselves Somali. If anything, they consider themselves quite independent of political claims and land grabs!
